sentences.sContent: She liked to dance but felt awkward if someone was watching her.
sentences.sCn: 她喜欢跳舞，但要是有人看着，她就觉得不舒服。

sentences.sContent: Make sure that the baby is not sleeping in an awkward position.
sentences.sCn: 要确保小宝宝睡姿舒服。

synos.tran: 尴尬的；笨拙的；棘手的；不合适的

remMethod.val: aw(看作awe， 恐惧) ＋ kward(看作backward， 向后的) → 由于恐惧所以向后退 → 尴尬的场面 → 尴尬的
